notes.Home: Identified CLS regression in `LazySection` placeholders for `RemotionVideoEmbedWrapper`. Fixed by using `aspect-video` instead of fixed height.

changes.description: Updated `RemotionVideoEmbedWrapper` placeholders in `app/page.tsx` and `app/_components/RemotionVideoEmbedWrapper.tsx` to use `aspect-video w-full max-w-[800px] mx-auto` instead of fixed `h-[450px]`.
changes.expectedImpact: Reduces CLS on mobile devices where 16:9 video height is less than 450px.
changes.verification: Inspect Home page on mobile viewport. Ensure placeholder height matches loaded video height.
